Authors:
Wang Yang, Yong-Lan Tuo, Dong-Mei Wu, Neng Gao, Zhen-Hao
Zhang, Gu Rao, Xiao-Min Wang, Yu Li, Bo Zhang, jing wang
Title: Two novel boletoid fungi from Northeast China
Abstract:
During investigations in the Northeast China, many
specimens of boletoid fungi were collected. Based on study of morphology
and phylogeny, two new species Butyriboletus pseudoroseoflavus and
Tengioboletus subglutinosus are introduced. Morphological evidences and
phylogenetic analyses of combined dataset (ITS or 28S, rpb1, rpb2 and
tef1) confirmed them as two new species, and indicated their
relationships with other species within their genus. Detailed
description, color photographs and line drawing are provided.
